annul.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to officially state that a marriage or legal agreement no longer exists
annul.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Their marriage was annulled last year.
annul.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to officially state that an official decision or a contract is no longer valid
annul.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: They are seeking to have the bankruptcy order annulled.
